name: Apple MacBook Air M1 Space Gray

description.title: With new power
text: With the introduction of the Apple M1 chip, the thinnest and lightest MacBook has undergone a complete transformation.

The central processor now operates up to 3.5 times faster, while the graphics processor is up to 5 times faster.Thanks to the advanced Neural Engine system, the speed of machine learning has increased by up to 9 times.

description.title: Small chip. Monumental breakthrough
text: Introducing the Apple M1 chip, the first chip designed specifically for Mac. It's remarkable that the Apple M1 system-on-a-chip packs in 16 billion transistors, integrating the central and graphics processors, Neural Engine system, input-output controllers, and many other components. The Apple M1 chip enables the use of unique technologies on Mac and delivers astonishing performance, coupled with industry-leading energy efficiency.

description.title: 16-core Neural Engine system
text: Machine learning up to 9 times faster. Wow. Applications on MacBook Air can leverage machine learning technologies, for example, for automatic professional-level photo correction or more precise application of smart tools and audio filters. It's like having real computer intelligence at your service.

description.title: Better than the previous models.
text: The new Apple MacBook Air is lightweight, stylish, and portable, making it the perfect choice for both students and professionals. The MacBook offers a stable and reliable operating system that is intuitive, user-friendly, and visually pleasing. Professionals from various fields prefer using MacBook for their work.

Whether you're looking for a machine capable of video editing or simply running basic tasks like spreadsheets, you'll find that MacBook is suitable for you. The affordable MacBook Air 2022 model will be an excellent investment.

description.title: Display and Design
text: The MacBook Air 2022 features a larger 13.6-inch display but with thinner bezels all around. The display has a notch, which makes the product resemble the new 14-inch MacBook Pro. The notch at the top of the screen accommodates a much-improved webcam compared to the one in the 2020 MacBook Air. The new HD webcam (1080p), seen in the iMac and MacBook Pro 2021 models, is an excellent addition to the MacBook Air 2022.

description.title: Processor, Graphics, and Memory
text: IThe new MacBook Air will feature the M2 chip, which provides two additional graphics cores compared to the limitations of the M1. Apple also claims that the M2 not only offers higher performance but also consumes significantly less power, which should be advantageous for battery life.

description.title: New generation of processors, new level of power
text: According to the company's data, the new lineup offers a 20% increase in central processing unit performance, a boost of up to 30% for graphics processing, and a 40% improvement for the Neural Engine. Equally important, the number of processor cores has increased to 10/12 in the 14-inch Pro model. The 14-inch model also features 30 graphics cores, and the memory bandwidth has been increased to an incredible 200-400 GB/s.

description.title: Features and Specifications
text: The new 2023 MacBook 14, based on the Apple M2 chip, operates six times faster than top-of-the-line Intel-based Macs and supports up to 96GB of unified memory for the most complex and demanding professional tasks and resource-intensive workflows.
